createSoundbite.title: Create Soundbite
createSoundbite.description: Take your first step into the world of soundbite, support content broadcasters, and be part of the fun!

authForgotPassword.title: Forgot Your Password?
authForgotPassword.description: Easily reset your password to regain access to your account.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage all your soundbite activities in one place and track your performance.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Easily update your account information and preferences.

discoverSoundbite.title: Featured Soundbites
discoverSoundbite.description: Browse the most popular soundbites and join the fun!

authLogin.title: Log In
authLogin.description: Log in to your account and step into the world of soundbite.

authRegister.title: Sign Up
authRegister.description: Create an account and become part of the soundbite world.

balanceHistory.title: Balance History
balanceHistory.description: View details of all your deposits, withdrawals, and spending transactions.

footer.description: With {title}, you can create soundbites and join our community.
